articles.title: League of Legends’ next champion revealed: Nilah, the Joy Unbound - Polygon
articles.description: Nilah is the next League of Legends champion. She’s a warrior monk from distant lands who calls on the bound demon of joy with her water whip in the bot lane. Here’s her ability kit.
articles.content: The next League of Legends champion is a bot lane skirmisher with a water whip and an ancient demon in her pocket. Nilah, the Joy Unbound, is a warrior monk pledged to a legendary order that has seal… [+3000 chars]

articles.title: Apple MacBook Pro 13-Inch (2022, M2) Review - PCMag
articles.description: The 2022 reboot of Apple's 13-inch MacBook Pro gets points for its peppy new M2 processor, which delivers a raw-performance uptick, and remains an iconic design. But we'd have liked to see more daring innovation on the rest of the laptop.

articles.title: Google News gets more personal with desktop redesign - The Verge
articles.description: Google News has a new look for desktop users. The aggregated news source now gives more prominence to local news and personalized news topics.

The new-look Google News makes local news and custom topics easier to find.
